thread.title: See how Priyanka Chopra spent her weekend
thread.title_full: See how Priyanka Chopra spent her weekend | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: See how Priyanka Chopra spent her weekend
text:
After working for un-countable hours and her busy schedule, actress Priyanka Chopra has finally got some time to chill this weekend. 

The 34 year-old took to Instagram and posted a photo of herself spending a perfect weekend. 

She captioned the photo, "Sunday be like.. #sundancing". 

Sunday be like.. ðŸ’‹ðŸ‘£ðŸ•¶ #sundancing 

A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 19, 2017 at 11:54am PST 

In the photo, the 'Quantico' star can be seen sporting a cool look with her sunglasses game on point. 

The actress was also seen hanging around with Sarah Jessica, Huma Abedin and Diane Kurger , during her first visit to the New York fashion week 2017. 

On the work front, PeeCee will next be seen in her Hollywood debut, 'Baywatch', directed by Seth Gordon, alongside Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson and Zac Efron . 

The film is slated to release on May 26, 2017.
